summary: Meta is reportedly splitting its AI department into two new teams . The AGI Foundations team will focus on consumer-facing efforts like Facebook, Instagram, and WhatsApp . The company recently launched aLlama for Startupsprogram to encourage early-stage companies to use their products for generative AI applications .  build-products-faster/http://://www.build-product-fasters.com/build-products/faster. build-product speed is faster .
